title: Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes        Detail of a print of Thaddeus Kosciuszko, ca. 1870 by Henry Bryan Hall Library of Congress   Â    Admission is free.  The site is open on Saturdays and Sundays from 12noon - 4pm, from April through October.  It is usually closed from November through March. Please check the operating hours for more information.   Looking for National Park Service passes?  The Thaddeus Kosciuszko National Memorial does not issue America the Beautiful passes.  Read more about America the Beautiful pass options and issuing agencies.
